transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello, hi sir, good afternoon. I am Anju speaking from IndiaMART.

Customer: Ji, bataiye.

Executive: Uh, kal aapka call aaya tha, uh, aapke end se, sir kya issue aa raha hai?

Customer: Shayad bhaiya ne kiya hoga.

Executive: A may be ho sakta hai sir. Ji ji. Ha, Veeraj ji ne call kiya hua kal. Mai discuss kar leta phir mai aapko call back karta hu.

Executive: Ji, aap sir ek bar unse discuss kar lijiye kya issues hai. Aap ek bar unse connect karwa dijiye mujhe.

Customer: Mai discuss, mai abhi lunch pe hu mam. Sir mai abhi lunch karne ko office ja raha hu wapas. To aapko call back karta hu.

Executive: Thik hai, thik hai.

Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer had an issue and called yesterday.

- Customer is currently at lunch.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to connect with the person who called.

- Customer will call back after lunch.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, issue, callback
